5871.TW.summary: Chailease Holding Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various leasing and financing services in Taiwan, China, ASEAN countries, and internationally. It offers leasing services for a range of assets, including transportation, industrial, medical, and information and office-related equipment, as well as aircraft; and installment sales service to corporate customers in various industries, such as transportation, storage and communications, wholesale and retail, and construction, as well as to individual consumers. The company also provides import/export factoring services; direct financing services, such as corporate loans to SMEs, and micro and large size enterprises; and debt collection and management, debt and collateral appraisal, auctioning, and past-due accounts receivable management services to financial institutions. In addition, it offers personal and property insurance brokerage; solar power; and real estate development services. Further, the company provides house property leasing and management services; financial consulting and investment activities; mortgage services; and cloud products software. Chailease Holding Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. Chailease Holding Company Limited was formerly a subsidiary of Financial One Corp.
